author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia's Shoigu, Israel's Lieberman discuss Syrian de-escalation zone: TASS
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu on Thursday discussed a de-escalation zone in southern Syria with Israeli Defence Minister Avigdor Lieberman, TASS news agency said.
FILE PHOTO: Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu waits before a meeting of Russian President Vladimir Putin with Qatar's Emir Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad al-Thani at the Kremlin in Moscow, Russia March 26, 2018. REUTERS/Sergei Karpukhin/File Photo Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Wednesday the withdrawal of all non-Syrian forces from Syriaâ€™s southern border with Israel should happen as soon as possible.
Reporting by Polina Ivanova; Writing by Tom Balmforth; Editing by Toby Chopra
